  • Welcome to gntplib

Welcome to gntplibÂ¶

gntplib is a Growl Notification Transport Protocol (GNTP) client library in Python.

gntplib is tested on Python 2.7/3.2, Growl 1.3.3 and Growl for Windows 2.0.9.
